title: Interpretation of seeing heavy rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing heavy rain in a dream: Seeing heavy rain in a dream for a person is a sign of weakness, good skin, and an indication of pleasant events that the dreamer will hear soon. The vision varies from one person to another according to their gender, whether male, female or male, and what their condition was like in the dream, and we will learn about them in detail. In the following article: Seeing heavy rain in a dream Seeing heavy rain in a dream is a promising dream that indicates the dreamer’s happiness, joy, and improvement of his life conditions. Also, seeing someone in a dream with heavy rain falling in a dream is a sign of the abundance of money and food soon. The dream is considered A person with heavy rain is a sign of success and the achievement of goals that the person has striven for for a long time. Heavy rain in a dream indicates a close marriage and the formation of a happy and stable family. A dreamer who sees in a dream heavy rain is a sign of good morals and the reputation that he enjoys among those around him. Seeing rain Heavy rain in a dream is a sign of staying away from forbidden things and repenting to God and not committing sins and disobedience. Seeing heavy rain in a dream is according to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing heavy rain in a dream as good news and happiness that he will obtain in the coming days, God willing. If one sees heavy rain in His dream means success and success in many future matters in his life, God willing. Seeing rain in a dream symbolizes achieving the goals that the person has been striving for for a long time. Seeing heavy rain in a dream for the dreamer is a sign of the abundance of money and the abundance of livelihood that he will gain. Seeing rain Heavy rain in a dream is a sign of the collapse of problems and crises that the dreamer suffered from in the past. Seeing heavy rain in a dream is a sign of recovery from illness and overcoming health crises that afflict one’s life. What is the interpretation of seeing heavy rain on single women? Seeing an unmarried girl in A dream with heavy rain symbolizes a stable life and improved living conditions in the future, God willing. Seeing heavy rain in a dream is a good omen and a sign of success in academic subjects and obtaining the highest positions and grades. Also, a girl’s dream of heavy rain is a sign of achieving goals and obtaining a prestigious job. She had aspired to it for a long time. Seeing an unrelated girl in a dream under heavy rain is a sign that she will soon get married and have a happy family. Seeing a girl in a dream with heavy rain indicates the end of worries and getting rid of anxiety and crises that have plagued her life for a while. Long. Seeing heavy rain in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream in a dream of heavy rain is a good omen and a sign of marital happiness and the stability of her life’s affairs during this period. Also, a married woman’s dream of heavy rain is a sign of overcoming the sadness, worry, and worry that she has been experiencing since A long period. Seeing a married woman in a dream dreaming of heavy rain is evidence that she will soon give birth.

title: Interpretation of seeing betrayal in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing betrayal in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com, as betrayal is one of the worst things that a person feels and causes. He experiences severe pain during our article about single girls, married women, pregnant women, young men, and divorced women. What is the interpretation of seeing betrayal in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing in a dream a husband cheating on his wife. Running away with another girl indicates the husband’s intense love for his family and his constant devotion to his wife. Seeing a husband running away from his wife in a dream is an indication of The dreamer losing a loved one and feeling sad for him. Seeing infidelity in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s failure at work and rejection at work due to his frequent disagreements with his friends and his manager. Seeing a husband running in a dream is a sign of the huge loss of all his money and possessions and his many problems with his family and his attempt to escape from them. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a lizard in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a husband kissing someone other than his wife in a dream? Seeing a husband kissing someone other than his wife in a dream is an indication of the strong relationship between them and the presence of their love, affection, and intense respect for each other. Seeing a man kissing another woman in a dream is a sign of her constant fear of betraying her husband and trying to solve their problems. Seeing a husband cheating on his wife with a young woman and kissing her forcefully is a sign of his wife’s loyalty to him and their struggle together to secure the future of their children. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a kiss or a kiss in a dream in detail. What is the interpretation of seeing a wife leaving the husband’s house in a dream? Seeing a wife leaving her husband’s house in a dream is an indication of her failure in The fulfillment of any dream in her life and a major loss of all her property and money or a large number of marital problems. Seeing a wife’s divorce in a dream is one of the most beautiful visions that indicate the end of problems and brings her goodness and happiness. What is the interpretation of a dream of running with a lover? Dreaming of running away with a lover is an indicator of the dreamer’s feeling of fear. And anxiety about failure in his life. Seeing a man running away with his girlfriend in a dream and the presence of love between them is a bad vision that symbolizes the coming of evil and harm to the dreamer. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing an embrace in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing separation from one’s husband in a dream? Seeing separation between spouses in a dream. It leads to many problems and disagreements that can lead to divorce and the displacement of children. Seeing a couple separating in a dream is a sign that they are surrounded by bad friends and planning to destroy their lives. What is the interpretation of seeing a husband’s betrayal in a dream by Ibn Shaheen? Seeing a husband’s betrayal in a dream by Ibn Shaheen indicates a change in his condition for the worse and loss. His wealth and business. Seeing a woman cheating on her husband in a dream indicates her intense love for him and her constant effort to make him and them happy. Seeing a man cheating on his wife is a sign of the collapse of anxiety and sadness for their lives. See other interpretations: Interpretation of intercourse in a dream in detail. What is the interpretation of seeing a husband ignoring his wife in a dream? Seeing a husband ignoring His wife in a dream is an indication of the wife’s constant feeling of sadness for her husband because of her severe neglect. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth

title: Interpretation of a dream about eyeliner

preview.html: There is more than one color other than black, such as white and blue, and each color has a different interpretation in the world of visions and dreams, and we will explain that in this article from our website gptafser.com/, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing eyeliner in a dream for a single girl: Eyeliner in a single woman’s dream indicates that her life will change with marriage From a young man she loves. But if a girl sees that she is not satisfied with eyeliner in a dream. The dream indicates that she will be forced to marry someone she does not love. If a girl sees her boyfriend putting eyeliner in her eyes, the dream indicates that she will marry this person. Seeing coquetry In the dream of an unmarried woman, it symbolizes the proposal of a financially capable young man with good morals to marry her, and God knows best. If the girl sees herself, she will buy a box of kohl to beautify herself. The dream shows that she is an artificial personality who always tries to show people a personality different from her nature. Acquiring kohl and its tools In a girl’s dream, it indicates her good morals, her good loving qualities, and her participation in charitable work. But if the girl sees herself in a dream buying kohl, it indicates the dreamer’s desire to get closer to God and avoid sin. The same dream may indicate the presence of a friend in the dreamer’s life who guides her. To the right and prevents her from making a mistake. Seeing a white column in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she is choosing a person with whom she is currently in a love relationship. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eyeliner for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing eyeliner in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a bottle of coke in a married woman’s dream indicates her willingness to help Others. Eyeliner in a married woman’s dream shows many good things that she will get in the coming days, God willing. Seeing crying after applying eyeliner in a married woman’s dream indicates her dissatisfaction with her married life. Applying eyeliner in a woman’s dream means that she will do some things that It will completely change her life for the better. Buying eyeliner in a married woman’s dream. It may indicate some qualities that the dreamer possesses, such as interest in external appearance and self-confidence. Wearing eyeliner in a woman’s dream means renewal in changing her appearance or moving to a new home. If a woman sees herself in In a dream, she puts cologne on her eyelid. The dream shows that there are some problems in her life and she does not find anyone to stand by her side. Seeing a black eyeliner pencil in a married woman’s dream is a sign of a successful and stable married life. If the woman is planning to get pregnant in the current period and sees it in her dream She is wearing black eyeliner. The dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Seeing eyeliner in a woman’s dream is suffering from disagreement and lack of understanding between her and her husband. The vision indicates an improvement in conditions and an end to disputes. Interpretation of seeing eyeliner in a dream about a man and its meaning. The dream of seeing eyeliner applied On a man’s eyes means getting rid of sadness. Wiping the eyes indicates that you have fallen into distress, and God knows best. And if a man sees himself putting kohl on his eyes in a dream, this indicates a change in the dreamer’s circumstances for the better. Perhaps the same dream shows that it seems to people unlike What's hidden inside it?

title: Interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In today’s article, we talk about the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream through the encyclopedia. We also quote the interpretation of drinking coffee in a dream, as many people wonder about the interpretation of a dream about coffee and its connotations and meanings. We present to you the opinions of the interpreters and the interpretation of brewing. Coffee in a dream, all of this in the following lines. Interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream In this paragraph, we will discuss the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream in detail below. The dream of brewing coffee is considered a happy dream and a praiseworthy vision. Scholars of dream interpretation and visions indicate that the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream It is a sign that the dreamer will go through crises and problems that will cause him psychological exhaustion. The vision includes a sign of the end of problems in the dreamer’s life, so he must be reassured. The scholar Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of boiling coffee in a dream, as the dreamer has fears in his life, and despite that, these days will be spent in Peace. Interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream for a single woman. In this paragraph we will discuss the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream for a single woman in detail in the following lines. Seeing coffee boiling in a dream means that an unmarried woman will soon improve in her life, as scholars say that the dream brings good news about marriage. The girl is from a man who respects morals and religion. Seeing boiling coffee in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she is trying to achieve a goal in her life, and the dream indicates that she will get what she is looking for. Dream interpretation and visionary scholars explain that boiling coffee in a girl’s dream is evidence of her success in this world. And achieving the highest positions and positions. Interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream for a man. Many people wonder about the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream for a man, so in this paragraph we discuss the interpretation of this dream in detail below. Dream interpretation and visionary scholars explain that dreaming of brewing coffee indicates that the dreamer seeks to achieve success in His career. The dream indicates that he will achieve what he wants and that the job he is looking for will bring him a lot of money. Seeing coffee boiling in a man’s dream means that he will enter into a new business in life, but he must be careful, as there are evil people who want him to fail. Seeing boiled coffee while the dreamer is sad shows that he carries anxiety in his heart and is going through a psychological crisis, and the dream came promising him goodness and comfort. Interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream for a married woman. After we discussed the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream at the beginning of the article, in this paragraph we consider the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream. For a married woman in detail below. Dreaming about boiling coffee in a married woman’s dream means that she is living a happy and stable life with her husband. Dreaming about brewing coffee in a sad married woman’s dream indicates that she is facing a problem with someone around her that is causing her problems, and the dream indicates that peace between them is coming and that life You will return to peace again. The interpretation of seeing coffee and boiling it in a married woman’s dream is that she is going through financial hardship, and thus it is clear from the dream that the pain will end and the Gulf will come soon. The interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream of a pregnant woman in this poverty.

title: Interpretation of seeing the land cultivated in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of cultivating the land in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com. The vision through this article is of a single girl, married, pregnant, married, single young man, and divorced. What is the interpretation of seeing plowing the land in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing cultivating the land in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates that it will bring good and abundant livelihood if he owns this land, and it will bring It has many benefits. Seeing in a dream owning and cultivating land is a sign of good children and a stable emotional state. What is Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing cultivating the land in a dream? Seeing cultivating the land in a dream by Ibn Shaheen It indicates the blessing of living, health, and the fulfillment of distant dreams. Seeing cultivating the land in a dream indicates On the ease of conditions and God’s success for the pioneer in his life and the provision of food without any difficulty. Seeing in a dream the cultivation of wheat indicates material losses and an increase in debts to the fortuneteller. Seeing the harvest in a dream bodes well for the monarch and the nearness of a happy marriage. Seeing the cultivation of dry lands in a dream is one of the bad visions that indicate a weak character. And lack of responsibility. Seeing in a dream that you are walking in the field indicates high morals and good circumstances. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman plowing the land in a dream? Seeing a married woman planting the land in a dream indicates the approaching pregnancy and the arrival of many blessings in his hands. Seeing a married woman harvesting wheat and rice in a dream is Bad visions that indicate enduring a lot of problems and leaving work. A married woman seeing a green farm in a dream indicates striving to obtain halal money through projects. What is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees agricultural land in a dream? Seeing a single girl on agricultural land in a dream is It portends good luck, abundant sustenance, and marriage to a man who seeks to make her happy and provide the best for her. Seeing a single girl dying from her land in a dream is a sign surrounded by many problems and fears. Seeing a single woman harvesting the land is evidence of her love for her fiancé because of his good qualities. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing breasts. Seeing planting roses in the home symbolizes the arrival of goodness to the dreamer’s family and righteous children. What is the interpretation of seeing a farm in Dream? Seeing a farm in a dream indicates the pursuit of a distant dream and great effort to achieve the desired goal. Seeing a farm in a dream indicates many

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving alms in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of the vision of paying alms to the dead and the living through the Almowafir website, so stay with us. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving alms in a dream. Seeing a dead person giving alms in a dream is a good vision that indicates kindness, abundance of livelihood, and abundance of money. This vision also symbolizes longevity. Longevity, success in life, and ease of circumstances for the dreamer, God willing. Seeing a dead person giving alms in a dream indicates a good ending, bliss in his grave, and the abundance of his good deeds in this world, and God knows best. Imam Ibn Sirin says that seeing a dead person gives alms to the poor and needy in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer He will receive goodness and a large amount of sustenance. It is also said that seeing a dead father or mother in a dream pays alms. It is a sign that the dreamer did permanent charity for the soul of his parents, and was blessed with it in the grave, and God knows best. It is said in some ancient interpretation books that the dead person gives alms to the dreamer. In a dream, everything that is needed in this world, and God knows best. For example, if a dead person sees a dead person being given alms with money, then he dreams of wealth and a lot of money and hopes to achieve great wealth. And whoever sees a dead person giving him food and drink in a dream. This means that the dreamer will enjoy an abundance of Sustenance and blessing are in money and body. And whoever sees a dead person gives him charity in clothes in a dream. This is evidence of protection in this world and the hereafter and contentment with what God has provided him with. See also: Interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream as sick. Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking for charity in a dream. When the deceased appears in good condition and with clean clothes in A dream is asking for alms. This vision is directly reflected in the dreamer. This means that the dreamer must give alms to correct his condition, make his affairs easier, and for God to grant him what He wants and heal his sick, and God knows best. But when do we know that the dead person came to us in a dream because of his need for alms? The answer to this question will be according to the vision scenario. If the deceased appears in a bad condition and wears his clothes in the dream. This is evidence of his need for charity and his suffering from the torment of the grave. Seeing the deceased as if he is sick in a dream, crying, hungry or thirsty. Clear evidence of his desperate need. To charity. If he sees a dead person in a dream asking for money or a garment, he is in dire need of charity and the constant call for mercy and forgiveness. The meaning of charity in a dream according to the great dream interpreters. Imam Al-Sadiq says that charity in a dream is a way out of dangers and reassurance, and calm for the dreamer in his life, God willing. As for charity in a dream, according to the interpretation of Imam Ibn Shaheen. It is evidence that the dreamer has a great memory, and that asking for forgiveness is constantly glorified. As for the opinion of Imam Ibn Sirin regarding the interpretation of charity in a dream, he says God’s good news that worry and sadness will go away and the dreamer’s conditions will calm down, God willing. When He sees a merchant or farmer in his dream, it is as if he is giving alms. It is good news for him that his business will flourish and his crop will grow, and this is according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. Giving alms with forbidden money in a dream indicates fun in the world and a lot of immoral work and irresponsible behavior of the pioneer. It is charity

title: Interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream, via the website roy2a.com. Dreaming of baked potatoes in a dream means a lot of goodness, stopping pain, recovering from illness, improving living conditions. He does not like to buy or store raw potatoes, and it indicates worries and sorrows. As well as for the divorced woman, providing interpretations by the great imams of interpretation of visions and dreams, such as Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin, past and present, so follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing roasting potatoes in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing a dream that they are baking potatoes indicates hearing good news and getting money. Seeing potatoes in a dream indicates success, luck, and the fulfillment of desires. Raw cooked potatoes indicate the release of worries and anxiety. Seeing buying green potatoes in a dream indicates cunning and deception on the part of some close ones or friends. Seeing eating potatoes indicates problems and disagreements. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a palm tree in a dream. A dream: What is the interpretation of seeing potato bread in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a dream that they are baking potatoes for single women indicates achieving one’s desires and goals in life and overcoming difficulties. Seeing raw potatoes shows that problems are coming. If a girl sees that she is eating sweet potatoes, this indicates that he heard good news. What is the interpretation of seeing baking potatoes in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman baking potatoes in a dream indicates stopping suffering and pain, facilitating childbirth, and improving her living conditions. If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating cooked potatoes, this indicates an easy birth and the health of the newborn. If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating cooked potatoes, She herself buys raw potatoes, indicating that she will be exposed to problems and pain during pregnancy and childbirth. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a garden in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream for a married woman: Seeing him in a dream that he is baking potatoes for a married woman indicates the end of worry and anxiety, the end of marital problems and arguments, and improvement. Their living conditions. Seeing in a dream that you are peeling potatoes for a married woman indicates the collapse of problems and disputes and the improvement of their living conditions. If a married woman sees that she is storing raw potatoes in large quantities, it indicates the crises and difficulties she faces and the many problems in her life. Seeing potatoes in a dream for a married woman shows a lot of goodness. In her life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing potato bread in a dream for a divorced woman: Watching them roast potatoes in a divorced woman’s dream indicates achieving what she wants and overcoming difficulties and obstacles. Seeing a dream about raw potatoes in a dream about a divorced woman indicates adversity and anguish. What is the interpretation? Dreaming of a plate of potatoes with chicks: Looking at a tray of potatoes and chicken indicates hearing good news, the fulfillment of desires, and the fulfillment of desires. Seeing boiled potatoes in a dream indicates the end of anxiety and pain and enjoying good health. Dreaming of washing potatoes indicates the collapse of anxiety and anxiety and the achievement of success and distinction in academic or professional life. Read Also: Interpretation of seeing breast enlargement in a dream

Seeing the living intending for the dead in a dream is evidence of the hardship of life and lack of livelihood, and God knows best. If the living has decided to eat the dead fruit in the dream, it reminds him of supplication and a lot of seeking forgiveness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the living’s determination to eat fruit in the dream. On the dead person in a dream for an unmarried girl. Seeing an unknown person intending to eat and drink in a dream for an unmarried woman. Her lack of livelihood and livelihood is attributed to many problems in her life. If the girl gives the deceased money in a dream, then she is violating the rights of others. Giving the gift to the dead person in a dream is evidence of his righteousness. When a dead girl decides to do something and refuses in a dream, this is evidence of her many sins and disobedience, and God knows best. Giving new clothes in a dream to the deceased is good news that the dreamer will get married soon. Giving clothes to the deceased is a sign of safety and well-being. Seeing the dead person’s determination to eat bread in a dream indicates the distress of life and the abundance of strife in the home. Dry bread symbolizes Patience is followed by comfort. It is one of the good visions that It foretells his sadness and anxiety soon. Seeing giving bread to the dead in a married man’s dream indicates kindness to the dead, and frequently mentioning goodness and praying for him. If the dead person asks for something by pleading with the living in the dream, then he is asking for forgiveness for those who wronged him and took away his right to his life, and God knows best. title: What does it mean to see blood in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation?

preview.html: Seeing blood in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a married woman? There are many dreams in which a woman sees blood bleeding, whether from the mouth, nose, or other things, which makes her feel uncomfortable. Today we learn about the interpretations related to seeing blood and all the details it brings, and whether it leads to good or evil. What is the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream? For a married woman? Commentators said that seeing blood in general does not bode well, but rather symbolizes the pain and suffering that a person feels in his life, or that there are differences between them and a partner or family member, which may lead to the disintegration of ties and bonds. Kinship However, there are other gestures associated with the dream that may bode well. A married woman seeing that there is a cup of blood in her hand for her to drink inevitably frightens her, but dreams are only symbols of events that happened or occurred in reality, and here the dream means that one has benefited on the way. Or the other, by someone who has a position in society, who can intercede for her husband even to obtain a promotion or find a suitable job. As for the bleeding and then its sudden stop, it indicates the pain that the woman is suffering from, but it soon ends quickly without negatively affecting her psychology. A woman’s ability to stop bleeding on her own in some way is a sign of her ability to endure problems and find quick solutions before they escalate and cause a rift between her and the other party. If the bleeding continues, here is the problem, and the person with the vision must seek the help of a member of her family. It is wise to intervene between her and her husband, because the differences have been exacerbated unnecessarily recently, but stubbornness controls both parties. To a large extent. If the arm or leg is injured and blood drips from it, this is a sign that the banner is in a serious crisis at work and there is a possibility that the manager will resign from her services due to the many problems caused by her colleagues or vice versa and it is seen that the interest of the work is in her. In the case of a married and pregnant woman she is worried Very close to the time of birth, her dream is good news for her that the birth will end peacefully and safely and she will give birth to a healthy and disease-free baby. Especially if there is blood flowing from the vagina. Among the good sayings that were said about bleeding and married women are the happy events that happen to her, and radical transformations in her relationship with her husband. Seeing blood in a dream for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin did not see anything encouraging in this dream. Instead, in his interpretation, he resorted to the evils inherent in it, such as: He said that it expresses a great loss, whether in money or people, and for a married woman, seeing it reflects problems in married life that may result from hatred and envy after living in peace and stability. Continued bleeding It is a sign of weakness and frustration, after the failure of her reform efforts, whether in reforming the husband and disciplining his behavior, or in raising the children. Seeing blood flowing profusely from her mouth is evidence that she does not meet the required moral level, but rather that she is committing stupidity and injustice against her husband. As for the blood of the living

preview.html: As for exaggerating it, it causes negative effects on the person, whether in his life or in his relationship with others, and without talking to you for a long time, let us learn more from gptafser.com/ about daydreaming. What does insomnia mean in psychology? Daydreaming on a regular basis is one One of the most enjoyable and distinctive experiences of the human mind. Imagination in psychology is a world in itself and each of us builds our world according to our goals and desires in life. Daydreaming is always out of control because it is not subject to the rulings of the universe and there is no word in it that is impossible. Psychologists say that his A wide imagination is a person who is innovative and has creative ideas. Scientific studies have proven that daydreaming belongs to an area of ​​the brain called the default mode network. This area is more active when the brain is in a state of rest from its usual daily thoughts. Psychologists say that spending too much time in... Daydreaming is not good. This affects the psychological state of a person and makes him constantly wander, distracted, and dissatisfied with his life and reality. See also: When is a vision? Are imagination and daydreams a disease? Extensive imagination or daydreaming cannot be classified as a mental illness, according to books Psychology and the opinions of doctors. Even excessive daydreaming does not fall within the category of mental illness and doctors classify it only as an occasional mental disorder. Excessive daydreaming can develop as a result of psychological trauma or inhumane treatment, and here it gets worse and the person becomes more involved in his imagination. Fantasias usually appear Exaggerated since childhood and gradually develops until adulthood, the person uses it as a means to escape from bitter reality. Reasons for frequent daydreaming: Feeling of disappointment: This feeling comes when a person fails to achieve his dreams or finds obstacles whenever he tries to achieve his goals. Loss and disappointment in obtaining something It makes the person alienate. Loss of desire to integrate with the outside world or try again. Lack of self-confidence: It occurs as a result of two things. The first is that the person has been exposed to cruelty and severe criticism since childhood, which made him lose his self-confidence. The second issue is related to the person’s external appearance, such as short and full. They lose their confidence because A lot of social bullying. Inability to adapt: ​​This problem occurs when young adults are shocked or when a person lives in conditions that he cannot adapt to. Such as traveling in Western societies or living with people who are not like you, you do not feel that you belong to them and this makes you isolated most Time. Read also: Types of dreams Types of daydreams in psychology Daydreams are divided into two main types, namely positive and negative daydreams, and we will talk about them in detail in the following points: Positive daydreams: They work to develop thought and stimulate a person’s desire to realize himself and plan his future in an elaborate manner. These dreams activate the right half of the human brain and strengthen the nerves and memory centers in the mind. Therefore,...
